Text: Why is this file so damn big?

benwelker: I believe it's because the frame rate is so high: 59.940 fps. It's certainly not because of the resolution, which is only 640 x 360.

Also, the a/v is way out-of-sync; the farther into the program, the worse it gets. I'm currently DLing Jimmy.Fallon.2013.01.14.Uma.Thurman.720p.HDTV.x264-BAJSKORV to see if the sync is good there.
If its around 800mb, and it's Late Night with Jimmy Fallon, and by AFG..chances are its out of sync
See https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8026401 for a small, in-sync version of this program.
Not the first time a AFG release is out of sync. It happens so often actually that I'm not even downloading them anymore.
